ABOUT

Aikido is a Japanese martial art with its roots in Jujitsu and Judo. Aikido techniques are based on absorbing an opponentâ€™s attack and using their force against them. In this way, a person can overcome an opponent who is larger and stronger.

INSTRUCTORS

Jesse Brown - 4th Dan

Leader the Streak of Tigers. He is a life-long student of the martial arts. In addition to a 4th degree black belt in aikido, Jesse has a brown belt in judo

Sylvie Bougon - 2nd Kyu

Sylvie was born in France and came to Canada in 1988. Sylvie has been assisting with the Tigers program since she began training at Naka Ima in 2011.
